text: Joseph Patrick "Joe" Kenda (born November 14, 1946) is an American television presenter and retired police detective. He is the former Colorado Springs Police Department detective who solved nearly 400 murders in his career. He is featured on the Investigation Discovery television show Homicide Hunter, where he recounts stories of homicides he solved. Kenda was born in Herminie, Pennsylvania. He studied at the University of Pittsburgh. ==References== ==Other websites== *Joe Kenda at the Internet Movie Database *Homicide Hunter on Investigation Discovery Category:1946 births Category:Living people Category:American police officers Category:American television presenters Category:People from Pennsylvania
title: Joe Kenda
